translation.en: God, I'm getting big now.
- So, how was London? - It's crackling with revolution.
translation.es: ¿Cómo estuvo Londres? En la efervescenciade la revolución.

translation.en: The Poplar docks are on strike.
translation.es: Hay huelga en los muelles de Poplar.

translation.en: Did our friends give us what we asked for?
- How much? - Two hundred pounds.
Who did you meet?
An attache from the Russian embassy.
translation.es: Con un agregadode la embajada rusa.

translation.en: In a Chinese restaurant.
Our revolution is international. And it grows by the day.
translation.es: Nuestra revoluciónes internacional. Y crece día tras día.

translation.en: Jeremiah, Jeremiah... What do you see?
Your sister and Freddie got back this morning.
translation.es: Tu hermana y Freddieregresaron esta mañana.

translation.en: I tried following them, but Freddie's so good at getting away.
translation.es: Traté de seguirlos, pero Freddie es bueno para huir.

translation.en: He's like a fish.
Right, well, keep fishing, eh?
We wait until the boy's in position.
translation.es: Esperamos hastaque el niño esté en posición.

translation.en: - [Scudboat] Last bets now! - Don't spend your rent money, Charlie!
translation.es: ¡Últimas apuestas! ¡No gastes el dinero del alquiler,Charlie!

translation.en: That's your starters, gentlemen. No more bets.
translation.es: Caballeros, tomen sus números.No más apuestas.

translation.en: - I was here on time. - Finished.
- I got a tip off, I need this bet. - The race has started.
translation.es: Me pasaron un dato,necesito esta apuesta. La carrera ya comenzó.

translation.en: - Please. - No!
[sighs] Fine.
- Get rid of him. - [Arthur] We said no, now get out!
translation.es: - Deshazte de él.- Dijimos que no, ¡ahora vete!

translation.en: [man] All right. All right, I'm off. I'm off.
translation.es: Está bien, está bien.Ya me voy.

translation.en: Night, lads. See you tomorrow.
translation.es: Buenas noches, muchachos. Nos vemos mañana.

translation.en: - It's a good day. - Where's John?
translation.es: Fue un buen día. ¿Dónde está John?

translation.en: John is in the Garrison.
He says he wants a meeting about a family matter.
translation.es: Quería que nos reuniéramospara un asunto familiar.

translation.en: After he's said his piece he'll come back and take his place with Scudboat.
translation.es: Después de dar su discurso, volverá y tomará su puesto con Scudboat.

translation.en: Scudboat? John will be here in ten minutes.
- All right. - Five.
Wait.
Good boy.
John?
Put that down! Put that down!
This is for Cheltenham.
We're just taking back what's ours.
translation.es: Solo recuperamos lo que nos pertenece.

translation.en: There's more money here. Search everywhere.
translation.es: Aquí hay más dinero.¡Busquen por todas partes!

translation.en: All right John, there's only one man... No!
There's only one man guarding the house.
translation.es: Solo hay un hombre vigilando la casa.

translation.en: What's troubling you?
Polly, you know what it's been like. Since Martha died.
translation.es: Polly, sabes cómo han sido las cosas desde que Martha murió.

translation.en: God takes the best first.
translation.es: Dios se llevaa los mejores primero.

translation.en: Truth is, my kids have been running bloody rings around me.
translation.es: La verdad es que mis hijoshan superado mis fuerzas.

translation.en: Running barefoot with the dogs until all hours.
translation.es: Corriendo descalzoscon los perros hasta tarde.

translation.en: Pol, give him ten bob for some shoes. Is that it, John?
translation.es: Pol, dale 10 chelinespara zapatos. ¿Es todo, John? Tommy, sería mejor hacer esto sin ti.

translation.en: Tommy, it would be better to do this without you.
translation.es: Tommy, sería mejor hacer esto sin ti.

translation.en: Now what's your point?
What the kids need is a mother.
translation.es: Lo que los niños necesitanes una madre.

translation.en: So that's why I'm getting married.
translation.es: Por eso me voy a casar.

translation.en: Does this poor girl know you're going to marry her,
translation.es: ¿Y la pobre chicasabe que te vas a casar con ella o la sorprenderásde pronto?

translation.en: or are you going to spring it on her all of a sudden?
translation.es: con ella o la sorprenderásde pronto? Ya se lo propuse y dijo que sí.

translation.en: I already proposed and she said, "Yes."
translation.es: Ya se lo propuse y dijo que sí.

translation.en: I think there's a shell about to land and go bang.
translation.es: Creo que una bomba estáa punto de explotar.

translation.en: It's, er... It's Lizzie Stark.
John, Lizzie Stark is a strong woman,
translation.es: John, Lizzie Stark esuna mujer fuerte y estoy segura

translation.en: and I'm sure she provides a fine service for her customers.
translation.es: John, Lizzie Stark esuna mujer fuerte y estoy segura de que le da un serviciode primera a sus clientes.

translation.en: I won't hear the word. Understand? Do not use that word.
translation.es: ¡No toleraré esa palabra! ¿Entendido? No usen esa palabra.

translation.en: What word is that, John?
You know what word that is.
- Everybody bloody knows. - Everybody can go to hell.
translation.es: Todo el mundo sabe, carajo. Todo el mundo se puede ir al diablo.

translation.en: Whore. That word?
Or prostitute? How about that one?
Right. I want it known. If anyone calls her a whore again,
translation.es: Sepan que si alguien vuelvea llamarla puta,

translation.en: I will push the barrel of my revolver down their throats,
translation.es: le meteré el cañónde mi revólver

translation.en: and blow the word back down into their hearts.
translation.es: en la garganta y le detonaré la palabraen su corazón.

translation.en: Men and their cocks never cease to amaze me.
translation.es: Los hombres y sus penesnunca dejan de sorprenderme.

translation.en: John, Lizzie Stark never did a day's work vertical...
translation.es: John, Lizzie Stark jamás ha trabajadoen posición vertical...

translation.en: She's changed. All right. People change.
- Like with religion. - Lizzie Stark has got religion, eh?
translation.es: Con la religión, por ejemplo. ¿Lizzie Stark es religiosa?

translation.en: No! No, she doesn't have religion. But--
But she loves me.
Now listen, Tommy. I won't do it without your blessing.
translation.es: Ahora escucha, Tommy. No lo haré sin tu bendición.

translation.en: But of all the people in the world, I want you to see it...
translation.es: Quiero que tú en especial lo veas como...

translation.en: - As brave. - Oh, it's brave all right.
translation.es: ...algo valiente. Y vaya que es valiente.

translation.en: [Polly] Brave is going where no man has gone before.
translation.es: El valiente vaa donde ningún otro hombre ha ido.

translation.en: And with Lizzy Stark, John that's not what you'll be doing.
translation.es: Pero con Lizzie Stark, John, eso no es lo que te espera.

translation.en: Listen, Tommy. Welcome her to the family.
As someone who's had a hard life.
translation.es: Como alguienque ha tenido una vida difícil.

translation.en: All right? Because I need someone.
The kids need someone.
- Tommy! We've been done over! - What?
Jesus Christ!
What the bloody hell happened here?
[Scudboat] The Lees. All of them.
Cousins, nephews, even their bastards...
translation.es: Los primos, los sobrinos,hasta los bastardos...

translation.en: [Polly] They've taken anything they can lay their hands on.
translation.es: Se llevaron todo lo que pudieron.

translation.en: Four cash boxes.
They left these.
Wire cutters. Why would they leave that?
Nobody move.
I think our friends are playing the game.
translation.es: Creo que nuestros amigosestán jugando el juego.

translation.en: What game?
Aunt Pol. Don't touch anything.
Erasmus Lee was in France.
Shit...
Whenever we gave up ground to the Germans,
we'd leave behind booby traps, set up with wires.
We'd leave wire cutters as part of the joke.
translation.es: Les dejábamos los cortaalambrescomo parte de la broma.

translation.en: Somewhere in here there's a hand grenade.
Holy Jesus.
Attached to a wire.
Don't move any chairs or open any doors.
translation.es: No muevan las sillas,ni abran las puertas.

translation.en: Go easy, John Boy. Go easy.
Boys, no. It's not in here.
If it was in here, it would have blown by now.
translation.es: De ser así, ya habría explotado.

translation.en: It was my name on that bullet Erasmus sent.
translation.es: Mi nombre estaba escritoen la bala que mandó Erasmus.

translation.en: He's set up a trap all right.
But he's set it up just for me.
Finn stay exactly where you are.
I was pretending I was you.
Which door did you open to come in?
I didn't. I climbed in.
I want you to climb out exactly the same way you climbed in, okay?
translation.es: Quieroque salgas trepando exactamente igual que como entraste,¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: No. Finn.
Clear!
[man] Are you all right?
It could've killed us.
That's why you should never pretend to be me, okay?
translation.es: Es por eso que no debesjugar a que eres yo, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: Okay?
I got you ten minutes with her.
translation.es: Te conseguí diez minutos con ella.

translation.en: You could say thank you. It's easier to see the Pope these days.
translation.es: Al menos deberías agradecerme. Hoy en día es más fácil teneraudiencia con el Papa.

translation.en: Put your hand on the Bible.
translation.es: Pon tu mano sobre la Biblia.

translation.en: I don't believe.
I know I didn't come here to lie.
translation.es: De todas formas,no vine a mentir.

translation.en: This war is cutting us all off.
A boy almost got killed.
A child.
You're all children.
I say enough.
Your boys tried to kill me and it didn't work.
translation.es: Tus muchachos trataronde matarme, pero no funcionó.

translation.en: I come here with a proposition.
I thought he was your ally.
translation.es: Creía que él era tu aliado.

translation.en: I plan to betray him.
No wonder you won't touch a Bible.
translation.es: No me sorprendeque no toques una Biblia.

translation.en: - I have ambitions. - You want to play a switch.
- I need your boys. - For what?
Kimber's not the brains. There's a gadze who runs the races.
translation.es: Kimber no esel cerebro de la operación. Hay un gitano que manejalas apuestas de las carreras.

translation.en: I'm collecting smart people. But I need strong men too.
translation.es: Reúno gente inteligente,pero hacen falta hombres fuertes.

translation.en: Now your boys should know this.
We get the winner in one of every three races before
translation.es: Tenemos uno de cada tresganadores en las carreras,

translation.en: the race even starts. No need for chalkers or rafflers.
translation.es: antes de que comiencen.Sin tizas ni pronósticos.

translation.en: I'm talking certainties.
You're saying you're going to do someone down,
translation.es: Vienes jactándotede que traicionarás a alguien y al mismo tiempome pides que confíe en ti.

translation.en: and in the same breath ask me to trust you.
translation.es: y al mismo tiempome pides que confíe en ti.

translation.en: On my mother's side, we are kin.
translation.es: Somos familiapor el lado de mi madre.

translation.en: Let us talk family business.
Ada, can you do my back?
Ada?
I know what was in the envelope.
translation.es: Sé lo que había en el sobre.

translation.en: I looked. Money.
That bloke we met in London you said was a Frenchman,
translation.es: Y el tal francéscon el cual estuvimos en Londres,

translation.en: he was Russian. I'm not an idiot, Freddie.
How is it you take all the risks, and Stanley Chapman gets the money?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que corres todos los riesgos y Stanley Chapman se lleva todo el dinero?

translation.en: - It's money for the cause. - You're blind.
translation.es: Es dinero para la causa. Estás ciego.

translation.en: I'd be if your brothers had anything to do with it.
translation.es: Lo estaría si tus hermanosestuvieran involucrados. No se trata de ellos,sino de ti.

translation.en: This isn't about them. This is about you.
translation.es: No se trata de ellos,sino de ti.

translation.en: And me. And this.
You're a dreamer, Freddie.
You give money away while we rot in here.
And you talk about revolution.
I need to know.
Who are you loyal to, Freddie?
I said, who are you loyal to?
Did you have something to do with this?
I asked an acquaintance for an address.
translation.es: Le pedí una dirección a una conocida.

translation.en: She said she would only give it to me anonymously.
translation.es: Dijo que solo me la daría anónimamente,

translation.en: She is afraid of the consequences.
translation.es: porque le teme a las consecuencias.

translation.en: Whose address is it?
Tommy, I'd like to suggest a strategy.
Your message said, you have an address for me.
translation.es: Su mensaje decíaque usted me daría una dirección.

translation.en: Anonymous tip off.
The address of Stanley Chapman.
translation.es: Es la dirección de Stanley Chapman.

translation.en: - You promised me Freddie Thorne. - This is instead of Freddie Thorne.
translation.es: Me prometió la de Freddie Thorne. Traigo ésta y no la de Freddie Thorne.

translation.en: No deal.
Inspector, Stanley Chapman is a bigger fish than Freddie Thorne.
translation.es: Inspector, Stanley Chapman esun pez más gordo que Freddie Thorne.

translation.en: He is currently holding 200 pounds in cash.
translation.es: En este momento tiene200 libras en efectivo,

translation.en: Given to the Communist party by the Russian Government.
translation.es: donadas al Partido Comunistapor el Gobierno Ruso.

translation.en: That's right, Chapman has snow on his boots,
translation.es: Eso es, Chapman tiene cola que le pisen

translation.en: and all you need is a shovel.
translation.es: y todo loque necesita usted hacer es pisarla.

translation.en: If he talks, you'll have proof.
translation.es: Si él canta,usted tendrá la evidencia.

translation.en: You might even get that medal.
translation.es: Tal vez hasta le den esa medalla.

translation.en: Now, before I give you the address,
I want your word, that you will let Freddie Thorne
translation.es: quiero que me prometaque dejará que Freddie Thorne

translation.en: and my sister leave the city.
translation.es: y mi hermana se vayan de la ciudad.

translation.en: Very well. You have my word.
Our little truce is proving quite productive for both of us, Inspector.
translation.es: Nuestra breve treguaha sido muy productiva para ambos, inspector.

translation.en: I get the information and protection and you...
translation.es: Yo tengo la informacióny la protección, y usted...

translation.en: Well...
You get Bolsheviks.
But on a more pressing matter,
translation.es: Con respectoa un asunto más urgente,

translation.en: I'm afraid Mr Churchill is becoming impatient.
translation.es: me temo que el Sr. Churchillse está impacientando.

translation.en: And I fear that if you don't get back those stolen weapons soon,
translation.es: Y temo que si no recuperaesas armas robadas pronto,

translation.en: I will be replaced.
It would be the finish of me. That's for sure.
When my business with Kimber is done, the guns will be returned.
translation.es: Cuando se termine mi tratocon Kimber, devolveré las armas.

translation.en: - That was the deal. - Then I am in your hands. Completely.
translation.es: Ese era el trato. Entonces estoya su merced por completo.

translation.en: You hold all the cards.
But I hope to God, that my dismissal doesn't come
translation.es: pero le ruego a Diosque mi despido no llegue

translation.en: before your decision to hand back those guns.
translation.es: antes de su decisiónde devolver esas armas.

translation.en: I say this for your sake.
Because, if I were to be fired and it were your fault,
translation.es: Porque si me despidierany fuera su culpa,

translation.en: I would do things that would shame the devil.
translation.es: haría cosas que haríansonrojar al mismo diablo.

translation.en: My fury is a thing to behold.
On my last day in power for example, I would see to it
translation.es: En mi último día, por ejemplo,me encargaría

translation.en: that you and your scum brothers have your heads,
translation.es: de destrozarles las cabezas a usted

translation.en: stoved in with mallets and spades.
translation.es: y a sus viles hermanos,con mazos y palas.

translation.en: And your sister too.
The baby inside her would be of no consequence to me.
translation.es: El bebé que lleva dentro no me importaría.

translation.en: The only one to be spared would be your little brother, Finn.
translation.es: Al único que salvaría seríaa su hermanito Finn.

translation.en: He would however be lifted as a juvenile,
translation.es: Pero se lo llevarían como criminal juvenil

translation.en: and dumped into that part of the adult prison,
translation.es: y lo abandonaríanen esa parte adulta de la cárcel

translation.en: where men have the most appetite for boys like him.
translation.es: en donde los hombres añoran jovencitoscomo él.

translation.en: That would be a dark day indeed, Mr. Shelby.
translation.es: Ese sería en verdad un día negro,Sr. Shelby,

translation.en: If my dismissal comes before your decision.
translation.es: si mi despido llegaseantes de su decisión.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Know this...
The clock is ticking.
Stanley, it's the police.
Stanley, get here.
[Stanley] You bastards!
Look what we found.
Stanley Chapman does have snow on his boots.
translation.es: Stanley Chapmansí tiene cola que le pisen.

translation.en: Mr. Chapman...
You are fucked!
[Moss] He still refuses to say where it came from.
translation.es: Aún se niega a decirde dónde viene el dinero.

translation.en: I'm sure with a little persuasion, he'll tell us everything he knows.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que siendomás persuasivos nos dirá todo lo que sabe.

translation.en: Including the whereabouts of Freddie Thorne.
- Sir? - Your face is a picture.
I thought you had done a deal.
translation.es: Pensé que había hecho un trato.

translation.en: - Is that what you thought? - You gave your word.
My word?
Do people still talk about such things in this idiotic century?
translation.es: ¿Aún hablan de esas cosasen este estúpido siglo?

translation.en: My word to whom?
To a Peaky Blinder?
Now, interrogate Mr. Chapman until he tells us,
translation.es: Bueno. Interroga al Sr. Chapman hasta que diga

translation.en: where we can find Freddie Thorne and his wife.
translation.es: dónde encontrara Freddie Thorne y a su esposa.

translation.en: The source of the money is of secondary importance.
translation.es: La procedencia del dineroes algo secundario.

translation.en: You think my campaign against Shelby has become personal?
translation.es: ¿Crees que mi cruzadacontra Shelby se ha vuelto personal?

translation.en: Correct.
'Spot on', as they say in London society.
translation.es: "Le diste en el clavo",como dicen los londinenses.

translation.en: Now, go and interrogate Mr Chapman,
translation.es: Ahora ve e interroga al Sr. Chapman,

translation.en: and do not make the mistake of being too gentle.
translation.es: y no cometas el errorde ser demasiado gentil.

translation.en: Right, sir.
Today's her birthday.
I know you never miss it.
translation.es: Sé que nunca te lo pierdes.

translation.en: Then I'm lucky you're not a copper.
- What do you want? - I came to warn you.
They lifted Stanley Chapman.
How do you know? The police don't spill that information.
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo sabes? La policía no divulga esa información.

translation.en: It was me and Tommy who tipped them off.
translation.es: Lo sé porque Tommyy yo lo delatamos.

translation.en: In return for safe passage for you and Ada,
translation.es: Tommy hizo un trato:a cambio de protección para ti y Ada, les entregóa Stanley y el dinero.

translation.en: Tommy gave them Stanley and the money.
translation.es: para ti y Ada, les entregóa Stanley y el dinero.

translation.en: Money? What money?
- Who told you about the money? - Who do you think?
It was Ada's idea. That's how desperate she is
translation.es: Sí, fue idea de Ada.Es tal su desesperación

translation.en: to get out of that rat hole you're in.
translation.es: de salir del nidode ratas donde viven.

translation.en: She didn't want to be here when you found out.
translation.es: Ella no quería estar aquícuando te enteraras. A veces las mujeresdebemos tomar las riendas.

translation.en: Sometimes the women have to take over. Like in the war.
translation.es: A veces las mujeresdebemos tomar las riendas. Como en la guerra.

translation.en: You fucking Shelbys--
Don't swear over your mother's grave.
translation.es: ¡No maldigasen la tumba de tu madre!

translation.en: You play your tune and expect the whole world to dance to it.
translation.es: Esperan que todo el mundo baile a su son.

translation.en: You don't have time for this.
translation.es: No tienes tiempo para esto, Freddie.

translation.en: You did a deal? For me?
Don't flatter yourself. For Ada.
translation.es: No te creas tan importante,fue por Ada.

translation.en: And you think this copper will keep his word.
translation.es: ¿Y creesque el policía cumplirá su palabra?

translation.en: If he doesn't, Chapman will give you up.
translation.es: Si es así, están a salvo.Si no, Chapman te entregará,

translation.en: You'll still have to leave town. Same result.
translation.es: así que el resultado es el mismo.Se irán de aquí.

translation.en: - So neat. - So leave.
Except there's one thing that you got wrong.
He won't be able to give up my address. He doesn't know it.
translation.es: Stanley no podrá dar mi direcciónporque no la sabe.

translation.en: That's how it works.
None of us know each other's addresses.
translation.es: No sabemos las direccionesde nuestros compañeros.

translation.en: So you wasted your fucking time.
translation.es: Así que desperdiciaron su maldito tiempo.

translation.en: They'll keep beating him and beating him for information he doesn't have.
translation.es: Seguirán golpeándolo una y otra vez para sacarle información que no tiene.

translation.en: So all you've done is sign the death warrant of a good man.
translation.es: Solo sentenciaron a muertea un buen hombre.

translation.en: So you won't leave.
No! I won't fucking leave! If you want me out of Birmingham,
translation.es: ¡Claro que no me iré!Si me quieres fuera

translation.en: it'll have to be in a wooden box.
translation.es: de Birmingham, tendrá que seren una caja de madera.

translation.en: You lay a hand on our Ada, I'll put you in a wooden box myself.
translation.es: Si lastimas a Ada yo te pondréen esa caja.

translation.en: You raised a stubborn one there, Irene.
[Moss] You told me to carry on. I wanted to stop.
translation.es: Usted me dijo que continuara. Yo quería parar.

translation.en: He had some kind of seizure.
[Campbell sighs] So you killed him.
Did he give you an address?
What's the matter with you? He fell down some stairs.
translation.es: ¿Qué te sucede?Se cayó por las escaleras. ¡Esto no es el maldito Belfast!

translation.en: This is not bloody Belfast!
Not yet! But if men like him get their way, it soon will be.
translation.es: No aún, pero si hombrescomo él se salen con la suya, lo será.

translation.en: So find some stairs, throw him down, and call the coroner.
translation.es: Encuentra unas escaleras,lánzalo y llama al forense.

translation.en: Use Grayson.
If he has any awkward questions, ask about the welfare
translation.es: Si hace preguntas raras,pregúntale cómo está

translation.en: of his mistress in Salteley. That will shut him up.
translation.es: su amante en Salteley.Eso lo hará callar.

translation.en: [Kimber] To think I used to live in a shit hole like this.
translation.es: Y pensar que yo vivíaen un hoyo de mierda como este.

translation.en: Bloody animals.
But the Shelby's are doing an excellent job for us.
translation.es: Pero los Shelby hacen un gran trabajopara nosotros. No hemos perdido ni un centavo

translation.en: We haven't lost a penny
translation.es: No hemos perdido ni un centavo

translation.en: to rafflers or chalkers in eight race meetings.
translation.es: en pronósticos o favoritosen ocho carreras.

translation.en: - The bookies are purring. - So we throw the dog a bone.
translation.es: Los corredores de apuestasestán ronroneando. Así que le lanzamos un hueso al perro.

translation.en: I think so.
Mr Kimber. Mr Roberts. Come and have a look around.
translation.es: Sr. Kimber, Sr. Roberts,pasen y echen un vistazo.

translation.en: After you.
[Scudboat] You can feed half of Birmingham
translation.es: Vamos, Fred. Podrías alimentara medio Birmingham

translation.en: with what you've had for lunch. Get back to work.
translation.es: con lo que has comido.Regresa al trabajo.

translation.en: We heard the Lees had turned you over.
translation.es: Oímos que los Lee los atacaron.

translation.en: You shouldn't listen to gossip, Mr Kimber.
translation.es: No debería escuchar chismes,Sr. Kimber. Por aquí. Vamos, muchachos.De prisa.

translation.en: Business is good.
Since you know which horse is going to win before you set the odds.
translation.es: Sobre todo porque ya sabesqué caballo va a ganar antes de las apuestas.

translation.en: Your information is very much appreciated.
translation.es: Estamos muy agradecidospor la información que nos dan.

translation.en: So, where are they?
John, Lovelock, Scudboat. In here.
This is my team.
They'll take up their pitch at your convenience.
translation.es: Se ocuparán de la pistacomo mejor le convenga, Sr. Kimber.

translation.en: John is the book. Scudboat the bag man.
translation.es: John corre las apuestas.Scudboat es el tesorero,

translation.en: And of course we bring our own protection.
translation.es: y, por supuesto,traemos nuestra propia protección.

translation.en: Warwick. Next Saturday. At least 50 yards from the beer tent.
translation.es: Warwick. El próximo sábado. Por lo menos a 45 metrosde la carpa de cerveza.

translation.en: Gentlemen...
...and Lady.
I have in my hand a legal betting license.
translation.es: Tengo en mis manosun permiso de apuestas,

translation.en: Issued by the board of control.
The Shelby family has its first legal racetrack pitch.
translation.es: La familia Shelby tienesu primer hipódromo legal.

translation.en: Congratulations, there you go.
Thirty. Forty. Fifty.
These cigarettes have a strange smell, Arthur.
They smell like rotting water.
And look. Rats have got at some of them.
translation.es: Y mira,las ratas se comieron algunos.

translation.en: - They're stolen, aren't they? - Don't ask.
- You keep them on a boat. - What do you care?
translation.es: Huelen asíporque los guardas en un bote. ¿Qué te importa?

translation.en: Can you check my adding up, please?
You should make a new start with this place.
translation.es: Deberías comenzarde nuevo con este sitio.

translation.en: Do it properly. These cigarettes are not fit to sell.
translation.es: Hazlo bien. Estos cigarrillos no son aptospara la venta.

translation.en: Smells like Gallipoli.
You should find a new place to store them.
It has to be far away from coppers.
translation.es: Tiene que ser lejos de los policías.

translation.en: - But not rats? - All the wharfs have rats, Grace.
translation.es: ¿Pero no de las ratas? Todos los embarcaderos tienen ratas,Grace.

translation.en: - What's wrong with a dry warehouse? - Tommy's orders.
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de malocon un almacén seco? Son órdenes de Tommy.

translation.en: What orders?
Always keep Contraband near to petrol boat moorings.
translation.es: Mantener el contrabando cercade los buques petroleros.

translation.en: Don't boats get searched?
We moor them at junctions, so there's more than one way out.
translation.es: Los anclamos en intersecciones,para tener más vías de escape.

translation.en: No locks within a mile so we can move stuff fast.
translation.es: No hay cerraduraspara sacar las cosas rápido.

translation.en: Your brother doesn't obey the law, but he has rules.
translation.es: Tu hermano desobedece la ley,pero vaya que tiene reglas.

translation.en: He's a very precise man.
- Is my adding up right? - It is now.
[Campbell] One. Two.
Three.And four.
We'll search them one by one.
Please Lord, let that which I seek be found here.
translation.es: Señor,ayúdame a hallar lo que busco aquí.

translation.en: Not so much as a bullet, sir. Just more cigarettes and whisky.
translation.es: Ni siquiera una mísera bala, señor. Solo más cigarrillos y whisky.

translation.en: [Thomas] Arthur tells me you've been asking questions.
translation.es: Arthur dice que has estado preguntando

translation.en: About how we run our business.
And how we get our booze and where we keep it.
translation.es: Sobre cómo conseguimos el alcoholy en dónde lo guardamos.

translation.en: I'm just trying to help.
Let's you and me go for a walk.
translation.es: Vamos a caminar, tú y yo.

translation.en: - Where to? - Come on.
Why here?
You're a good Catholic girl, aren't you?
Yes.
Well, then you know it's here people come to confess.
translation.es: Y sabes que la gente viene aquía confesarse.

translation.en: After you.
Well, here it is, Grace.
I'll confess.
I need someone.
Kimber has an adviser by the name of Roberts.
translation.es: Kimber tiene un asesor llamado Roberts.

translation.en: He talks well. He keeps the accounts.
He runs the legal side of the business.
translation.es: Se encarga de la parte legal del negocio.

translation.en: And you need a Roberts.
Arthur tells me you have ideas.
I'm not an accountant. Nor a lawyer.
translation.es: No soy ni abogada ni contadora.

translation.en: But you have something I need.
Class.
I need someone who looks right at the big meetings.
translation.es: Necesito a alguien que luzca bienen las reuniones.

translation.en: Epsom, Ascot.
Is this a job interview?
Arthur says you're good with numbers.
translation.es: Arthur dice que eres buenacon los números. Eso es relativo.A él no se le dan.

translation.en: Well, that's relative. He is quite poor.
translation.es: Eso es relativo.A él no se le dan.

translation.en: - You keep the books in order. - They were chaotic.
translation.es: - Mantienes los libros en orden.- Eran un desorden.

translation.en: But you are a liar.
No Catholic girl would enter a church and forget to make the sign of the cross.
translation.es: Ninguna chica católica entraríaa la iglesia sin hacer la señalde la cruz.

translation.en: You are very perceptive.
You lied about the pub you used worked in.
translation.es: Primero mentiste sobre haber trabajadoen un pub.

translation.en: Now I find out you are Protestant.
translation.es: Y ahora me entero de que eres protestante.

translation.en: - Do you care? - No.
I lied to fit in.
You pull a pint like someone who's thinking about it.
This is not an interview, it is an interrogation.
translation.es: Eres muy lentapara servir cerveza. No es una entrevista.Es un interrogatorio.

translation.en: Sit down.
Look, Grace...
You washed up in a place you don't belong.
translation.es: acabaste en un sitioen donde no perteneces.

translation.en: For whatever reason.
- My good fortune. - And perhaps mine.
translation.es: Para mi gran fortuna. Y quizá la mía.

translation.en: You know that most of what I do is illegal?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que casi todolo que hago es ilegal?

translation.en: I'm not blind.
You'd still be willing to work for me?
Are you offering me the job?
Then I accept.
There's something else you should know.
translation.es: Hay algo más que debes saber.

translation.en: A very important detail about my reasons for employing you.
translation.es: Un detalle muy importantesobre por qué te contrato.

translation.en: You disappoint me.
Do you resign?
My appetite for the work has only increased.
translation.es: Mi entusiasmo por el trabajo ha aumentado.

translation.en: Tomorrow I'll show you around.
[Thomas] Lizzie.
Hello, Lizzie.
That bag looks heavy, jump in.
translation.es: Esa bolsa se ve pesada. Súbete.

translation.en: - Kids' teas. - You like kids?
translation.es: Es para los niños. ¿Te gustan los niños?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Good. John's got four of them.
translation.es: Sí. Qué bien,porque John tiene cuatro.

translation.en: I'm not going to try to talk you out of it.
translation.es: Tranquila, no voy a persuadirtede que lo dejes.

translation.en: I just want to talk.
You're not against us?
John's his own man.
And you are your own woman.
Now, Lizzie, since I came back from France,
I've come to you on many occasions.
translation.es: he ido a verte muchas veces.

translation.en: - Tommy, you didn't tell him. - No, I didn't tell him.
translation.es: Tommy,dime que no le dijiste. No, no le dije.

translation.en: Just like you didn't tell him.
translation.es: Al igual que tú no le dijiste.

translation.en: Now why didn't you tell him, Lizzie?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué no le dijiste, Lizzie?

translation.en: Why didn't you tell him that you'd been serving his brother
translation.es: ¿Por qué no le dijisteque su hermano ha sido tu cliente en los últimos dos años?

translation.en: for the past two years?
translation.es: tu cliente en los últimos dos años?

translation.en: Because the past is the past.
translation.es: Porque eso ha quedadoen el pasado.

translation.en: I don't want to lose him. He's a good man.
translation.es: No quiero perderlo.Es un buen hombre.

translation.en: That's the answer I was hoping you'd give. The past is the past.
translation.es: Eso es lo que esperaba oír. Eso ha quedado en el pasado.

translation.en: You see our John says you've changed.
And I believe him. And that's good.
Change is good.
These are new times I'm told.
translation.es: Me dicen que esta es una nueva era.

translation.en: I wish you both every happiness.
translation.es: Así que les deseoa ambos mucha felicidad.

translation.en: And I want you to see that as my wedding gift to you.
translation.es: Quiero que veas esocomo mi regalo de bodas para ti.

translation.en: And our farewell to pleasures gone by.
translation.es: Y nuestra despedidapor los placeres de antaño.

translation.en: You mean... One last time?
One last time. You and me.
It's eight bloody pounds.
So where shall we go?
Tommy? Shall we go to my lodging?
So the past is not the past.
translation.es: Entonces no ha quedadoen el pasado.

translation.en: You can keep the money. Get out of the car.
translation.es: Quédate con el dinero, Lizzie.Solo sal del auto.

translation.en: - Tommy, please. - Get out of the car.
translation.es: Tommy, por favor. Sal del auto.

translation.en: I love him, Tommy. Really.
Really.
John will make his own decision.
But he will have the facts.
Your brother is ten times the man you are!
translation.es: ¡Tu hermano es diez veces mejor que tú!

translation.en: [sighs] Of that I have no doubt.
He is obviously not stupid.
translation.es: Es obvio que no es estúpido.

translation.en: All we found was stolen tobacco and whisky.
translation.es: Lo único que encontramosfue tabaco y whisky robados.

translation.en: Which you left in place.
Of course. I would never endanger you.
You are doing well, Grace.
I've been working on Arthur. He is easier.
translation.es: He estado manipulandoa Arthur. Es más fácil.

translation.en: - Than Thomas. - Yes.
Less intelligent.
Yes.
Is that a word you would use about Thomas?
It's your word.
He has promoted me.
He wants me to be his bookkeeper and secretary.
translation.es: Quiere que sea su contadora y secretaria.

translation.en: A cutthroat gangster with a secretary.
The pretensions of these hoodlums are quite breathtaking.
translation.es: Las pretensionesde estos rufianes son increíbles.

translation.en: - Are they not? - Yes. Quite breathtaking.
He has obviously fallen quite heavily for you.
translation.es: Es obvio que está loco por ti.

translation.en: I thought you would be pleased.
translation.es: Creí que a usted le daría gusto.

translation.en: Remember who you're dealing with here.
translation.es: Espero que recuerdescon quién estás tratando.

translation.en: A man who cuts off ears and cuts out tongues.
translation.es: Con un hombre que corta orejas y lenguas.

translation.en: I know what he is, Sir.
The difficulty with undercover work, Grace, is to remember what you are.
translation.es: Lo difícil del trabajo encubierto, Grace, es recordar lo que tú eres.

translation.en: I come here with good news and I get this.
Grace.
I need a favor. I want to borrow the car.
translation.es: Necesito un favor. Quiero que me prestes el coche.

translation.en: I want to take Lizzie to the country with the kids.
translation.es: Quiero llevar a Lizzie a pasearal campo con los niños.

translation.en: We're going to celebrate getting the license.
translation.es: Vamos a celebrarque conseguimos el permiso.

translation.en: Not a problem, John.
I'll need the keys.
Look, John, you're my brother.
There's something I have to tell you.
Yesterday, on the front seat of that car, I offered Lizzie some money.
translation.es: Ayer,en el asiento delantero de ese coche, le ofrecí dinero a Lizzie.

translation.en: And John? She said, "Yes."
Now that's a fact. You do with it what you want.
translation.es: He ahí los hechos. Haz lo que quierascon ellos.

translation.en: Take the keys. Take Lizzie to the country.
translation.es: Toma las llaves.Lleva a Lizzie al campo.

translation.en: Marry her if you want.
But you have to know.
She said, "Yes."
Get another glass.
You make a toast?
I'm Irish, I can make a million toasts.
translation.es: Soy irlandesa, puedo hacerun millón de brindis.

translation.en: May you be in heaven a full half hour before the devil knows you're dead.
translation.es: "Que logres pasar media horaen el cielo antes de que el diablo sepaque has muerto".

translation.en: What are we celebrating?
Contract of employment.
Bookkeeper. Shelby Brothers Limited.
translation.es: Contadora. Compañía deCapital Limitado Hermanos Shelby.

translation.en: I don't like that word 'limited'.
To be respectable, you have to be limited.
translation.es: Para ser respetable hay que limitarse.

translation.en: That's what worries me.
translation.es: Eso es lo que me preocupa.

translation.en: I had the phone put in.
It's in the back.
If we knew someone else who had a phone, we could call them.
translation.es: Si conociéramos a alguien máscon teléfono, le llamaríamos.

translation.en: And since we are celebrating,
I had this delivered from Rackhams department store.
translation.es: ordené estode la tienda departamental Rackhams.

translation.en: Aren't you going to open it?
No. Save it. For a special occasion.
translation.es: No. Guárdala para una ocasión especial.

translation.en: Right, your first job for the company. I want you to get that to my sister.
translation.es: Este es tu primer trabajopara la compañía. Quiero que se la llevesa mi hermana.

translation.en: You don't see her?
No one does. She is hiding from me.
translation.es: En realidad, nadie la ve.Se esconde de mí.

translation.en: I am told she goes to a bathhouse on Montague Street.
translation.es: Me dijeron que va a los bañosde la calle Montague,

translation.en: On woman only days.
translation.es: en los días que son solo para mujeres.

translation.en: She goes in disguise, so I need to get someone inside.
translation.es: Va disfrazada,así que necesito a alguien adentro.

translation.en: What am I delivering?
It's an invitation to a family occasion.
I want her there. So tell her there will be a truce.
translation.es: La quiero ahí.Dile que habrá una tregua.

translation.en: Am I delivering bait for a trap?
If you check that contract, you'll find it doesn't say
translation.es: Si lees tu contrato,verás que no dice nada

translation.en: anything about asking questions. Give her the invitation.
translation.es: referente a hacer preguntas.Solo dale la invitación.

translation.en: And put that thing in the cupboard, until I say.
translation.es: Y pon esa botella en la alacenahasta que yo diga.

translation.en: What the hell, John?
I couldn't get it lit. Couldn't even do that.
translation.es: No pude encenderlo.Ni siquiera puedo hacer eso.

translation.en: Why would you want to be smoking that?
Same reason as you. Pain in the head.
translation.es: Por la misma razón que tú.Dolor de cabeza.

translation.en: I spoke to Lizzie. I told her what you told me.
translation.es: Hablé con Lizzie. Le dije lo que me dijiste.

translation.en: She said, "Your brother is a dirty liar."
translation.es: Me dijo: "Tu hermanoTommy es un mentiroso".

translation.en: But then I spoke to her sister and her cousin.
translation.es: Pero luego hablécon su hermana y su prima.

translation.en: Bought them a couple drinks.
translation.es: Les invité un par de bebidas.

translation.en: "Just a few of regulars", they said.
"That's all."
"To keep the wolf from the door, she still sees a couple of regulars."
translation.es: "Para tener un dinerito guardado, aún ve a un par de clientes".

translation.en: [sniffs] You must think I'm an idiot.
translation.es: Debes pensar que soy un idiota.

translation.en: I think you're the first Shelby in history,
translation.es: Pienso que eres el primer Shelbyen la historia

translation.en: to have a legal license for anything.
translation.es: que tuvo una licencia legal de algo.

translation.en: What would our granddad say, eh? He'd be turning in his grave.
translation.es: ¿Qué diría nuestro abuelo? Se revolcaría en su tumba.

translation.en: "Honest bloody money? Eh? In this house? In here?"
You always used to do voices when we were kids.
translation.es: Siempre hacías voces cuando éramos niños.

translation.en: Well, we're not kids now, John.
But we still have to look out for each other, right?
translation.es: Pero aún nos cuidamos el uno al otro, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah. Come on. Go home.
Get some sleep. We've got a big day tomorrow.
translation.es: Duerme un poco. Nos espera un gran día mañana.

translation.en: We have?
Tomorrow we finish the war with the Lees once and for all.
translation.es: Mañana terminamos la guerracon los Lee, para siempre.

translation.en: - Since when? - Since just now.
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo? A partir de ahora mismo.

translation.en: Ten o'clock tomorrow.
translation.es: Mañana a las diez en punto.

translation.en: Be ready for anything.
Out you get boys.
[Thomas] Ready boys?
- John, ready? - Yeah, I'm fine.
Have a drink.
What? Why are you all staring at me for? What?
Good. Let's go.
What?
Tommy, what's your plan? We are in shotgun range.
translation.es: Tommy, ¿qué harás? Estamosen el alcance de las escopetas.

translation.en: John, before we go into battle...
translation.es: John, antes de salir a la batalla...

translation.en: There's something you're going to need.
What are you bloody doing, Tommy?
Smile, John, it's a wedding.
Whose bloody wedding?
Now if we'd told you, you wouldn't have come.
translation.es: Si te hubiéramos dicho no habrías venido.

translation.en: There's a girl from the Lee family who's going a bit wild.
translation.es: Hay una chica de la familia Leeque anda un poco alocada.

translation.en: And she needs marrying her off.
- Ah, fuck! - John boy, John, boy!
John!
You have no bloody right, Tommy!
Listen to me. Listen to me.
A girl who needs a husband. A man who needs a wife.
translation.es: Una mujer que necesita un esposo.Un hombre que necesita una esposa.

translation.en: Tom, I'm not bloody marrying some fucking mushroom picker...
translation.es: Tommy, ¡no me voy a casarcon una recolectora de hongos!

translation.en: [shushing] John boy, come on. Listen.
I have already betrothed you.
If you back out now, there's gonna be a mighty war breaking out here.
translation.es: Así que si te acobardas ahora,estallará una maldita guerra tan grande que haráque la batalla de Somme

translation.en: It's gonna make the Somme...
translation.es: tan grande que haráque la batalla de Somme

translation.en: It'll make the Somme look like a tea party.
translation.es: parezca una puta fiesta de té.

translation.en: But if you marry her, our family and the Lee family
translation.es: Pero si te casas con ella,tu familia y la familia Lee

translation.en: will be united forever. And this war will be over.
translation.es: estarán unidas para siempre.Y esta guerra se acabará.

translation.en: Now, it's up to you John.
War or peace.
Let go of me.
Right.
You should see the size of her dowry.
translation.es: Deberías ver la magnitud de su dote.

translation.en: Her what?
Her dad is giving you a car.
translation.es: Su padre te dará un coche.

translation.en: Will he do?
He'll do.
Here she is.
[John] She'd better be under 50.
translation.es: Más vale que sea menor de 50 años.

translation.en: Come here. Go on.
[Johnny Dogs] We're here today to join in matrimony,
translation.es: Estamos reunidos aquípara unir en matrimonio

translation.en: this man and this woman.
translation.es: a este hombre y a esta mujer...

translation.en: You look well.
...and harmony and togetherness.
Which is sanctioned and honored by the presence,
translation.es: que han sido honradaspor la presencia

translation.en: and power of these two families around us.
translation.es: y poder de estasdos familias con nosotros.

translation.en: Do you John Michael Shelby
take Esme Martha Lee to be your beautiful wife?
You got my invitation.
Grace said there's a truce.
Family day.
- Your husband couldn't make it? - He's not speaking to me.
translation.es: ¿Tu esposo no pudo venir? No me dirige la palabray cuando lo hace, me llama

translation.en: And when he does, he calls me, "A fucking Shelby."
translation.es: No me dirige la palabray cuando lo hace, me llama "maldita Shelby",a pesar de que ahora soy una Thorne.

translation.en: Even though I'm a Thorne now.
translation.es: "maldita Shelby",a pesar de que ahora soy una Thorne.

translation.en: Thorne in my side that's for sure.
translation.es: Y un dolor de cabeza para mí,eso sin duda.

translation.en: To have and hold--
My God, Tommy. You admire him, don't you?
There remains one more part of the ceremony.
That's the mingling of the two bloods.
translation.es: Es la mezclade las dos sangres.

translation.en: Where the two families become the one family.
translation.es: En donde las dos familias se vuelven una.

translation.en: I now pronounce you man and wife!
Come on, John, kiss the bride, will you?
translation.es: Vamos, John.Besa a la novia, anda.

translation.en: [Ada] Spin me round again.
- Tell Ada to slow down. - You think she'll listen to me?
translation.es: Dile a Adaque vaya más despacio. ¿Crees que va a escucharme?

translation.en: I tried to stop her but she's been drinking.
translation.es: Traté de detenerla,pero ha estado bebiendo.

translation.en: She's been stuck in that basement for weeks.
translation.es: Ha estado encerradaen ese sótano por semanas.

translation.en: What do you expect? She's going off like a firecracker.
translation.es: ¿Qué esperabas?Está perdiendo la cabeza. Por Dios, Tommy.Por favor.

translation.en: Oh, Christ, Tommy, please.
[Arthur] Come here. Enough now. Enough.
Ada, come on, have a rest. Sit down.
Come and look Esme! Look at the family you've joined!
translation.es: ¡Ven a ver, Esme! ¡Ven a ver a la familiaa la que te has unido!

translation.en: Come, look at the man who runs it! He chooses his brother's wives!
translation.es: ¡Ven a ver al hombreque la dirige! ¡Escoge las esposasde sus hermanos!

translation.en: He hunts his own sister down like a rat and tries to kill his own brother-in-law.
translation.es: ¡Persigue a su propia hermana y trata de matar a su propio cuñado!

translation.en: Ada, that's enough.
Now he won't even let me have a fucking dance!
translation.es: ¡Y ahora ni siquiera me deja bailar!

translation.en: - Not even at a fucking wedding! - Sit her down.
Calm down, Ada. Ada, you must calm down.
Holy shit. Water. Right.
[Arthur] Bloody hell Ada, you do pick your times.
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea, Ada!¡Sí que sabes escoger el momento ideal!

translation.en: Slow her up. Nice and easy.
[John] Story of your life, Arthur.
translation.es: La historia de tu puta vida, Arthur. Bien, ya llegamos.

translation.en: Right, we are here.
Come on.
Nice car, John. How's she run?
Beautiful. Really smooth.
Your sister's giving birth and you're talking about a car.
translation.es: Como una belleza.Muy suave. Tu hermana está por dar a luz y tú hablas de un maldito coche.

translation.en: Not much us men can do now.
translation.es: Un hombre no puede hacer más, Pol.

translation.en: - Except go get drunk. - Right, come on.
translation.es: Excepto emborracharse. - Bien, vamos.- Un hombre sí debería estar aquí.

translation.en: There's one man who should be here.
translation.es: - Bien, vamos.- Un hombre sí debería estar aquí.

translation.en: You are right, Pol, Freddie should be here.
translation.es: Tienes razón, Pol.Freddie debería estar aquí.

translation.en: Is that a heartbeat I hear inside that chest?
The truce lasts till sunrise.
translation.es: La tregua dura hasta el amanecer.

translation.en: On my oath. Tell Freddie it's safe.
translation.es: Como lo juré.Dile a Freddie que está a salvo.

translation.en: Ada!
Right boys, let's wet the baby's head.
Keep going. That's right. Push.
I think it might be the wrong way round.
I attended three sisters.
translation.es: Asistí en el partode mis tres hermanas.

translation.en: You're right.
- We should lean her forward. - Come on, Ada.
Come on. Not long to go now, darling.
[Polly] Push, two, three.
[Arthur] To beautiful women.
I should go. It's my wedding night.
translation.es: Debo irme. Debo irme.Es mi noche de bodas.

translation.en: You sit down.
You don't want to be among women when there's a baby coming.
translation.es: Siéntate.No querrás estar rodeado de mujeres cuando hay un parto.Tómate otro.

translation.en: You think her husband will stay away?
translation.es: ¿Crees que su esposo haga lo mismoy se mantenga al margen?

translation.en: [John] Freddie will be there. Nothing will keep him away.
translation.es: No, Freddie estará ahí. Nada lo alejará.

translation.en: Tommy said it's all right for him to be there. Isn't that right?
translation.es: Y Tommy dijoque está bien que esté ahí. ¿No es verdad, Tommy?

translation.en: That's right. I'm all heart tonight.
You know what, John boy?
I think it's that lovely barmaid, that pretty one that just walked out
translation.es: Creo que esa linda camarera, esa bonita camareraque acaba de salir,

translation.en: that's made our brother go all soft.
translation.es: es la que hizoque nuestro hermano se endulzara.

translation.en: [John] Drinks to that.
Ada!
Come on, open up.
There you go, love.
Aw, he's beautiful.
It's a boy, Freddie.
It's a beautiful baby boy.
There you go.
Welcome to the world, son.
Welcome.
Open up! Police!
You can't come in here. There's a baby just been born.
translation.es: ¡No pueden entrar,acaba de nacer un bebé!

translation.en: [Ada] Don't hurt him. Freddie.
You are hurting him, leave him alone.
You're taking me away from my baby.
- Ada! - Freddie!
You want me to open that champagne now?
It's a boy.
Pol? Polly? Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
Polly! Polly!
But the police came and took his father away.
translation.es: ¡Pero la policía vinoy se llevó a su padre!

translation.en: Don't you dare look at me like that.
You liar!
